guide.defaultMessage:
I am your personal intelligent assistant {{appName}}. How can I assist you today?
If you need a more professional or customized assistant, you can click to create a custom assistant.
guide.defaultMessageWithoutCreate: I am your personal intelligent assistant {{appName}}. How can I assist you today?

a01.description: Multi-perspective collaborative ideation and creative problem solving
a01.prompt: Let's start a brainstorming session for the project. Can you help us generate creative ideas and solutions?
a01.title: Brainstorming

a02.description: A social deduction game where players use strategy and discussion to identify the werewolves
a02.prompt: Let's play Werewolf! Can you help us set up the rules and moderate this social deduction game?
a02.title: Werewolf Game

a03.description: Simulated UN debates and diplomatic negotiations on global issues
a03.prompt: Let's simulate a United Nations debate. Can you help us set up a diplomatic negotiation on a global issue?
a03.title: Model United Nations

a04.description: A collaborative feedback session for design concepts, prototypes, or creative works
a04.prompt: We need to review some designs. Can you help us provide constructive feedback on design concepts and prototypes?
a04.title: Design Review

a05.description: Technical discussions and peer reviews of code changes and implementations
a05.prompt: Let's review some code together. Can you help us analyze the code and identify areas for improvement?
a05.title: Code Review

a06.description: An agile estimation technique using cards to estimate project tasks and effort
a06.prompt: We're running a planning poker session for the project. Can you help us estimate task effort using agile techniques?
a06.title: Planning Poker

a07.description: Structured discussions and debates on a range of topics and current events
a07.prompt: Let's hold a structured debate. Can you help us organize a reasoned discussion on this topic?
a07.title: Debate Club

a08.description: Collaborative study sessions to discuss concepts and solve problems together
a08.prompt: Let's form a study group. Can you help us understand these concepts and solve problems together?
a08.title: Study Group

a09.description: Literary discussions and analyses of books, stories, and literary works
a09.prompt: Let's start a book club discussion. Can you help us analyze this book and explore its themes together?
a09.title: Book Club

a10.description: Fun interactive games and activities to build team bonds and enjoy some fun
a10.prompt: Game night is on! Can you help us organize some fun interactive games to build team camaraderie?
a10.title: Game Night

a11.description: Watch and discuss films, documentaries, and visual media together
a11.prompt: Let's start a film club discussion. Can you help us analyze this film and explore its themes together?
a11.title: Film Club

a12.description: Practice speaking and learn new languages with native speakers
a12.prompt: Let's practice a new language together. Can you help us learn and practice speaking it?
a12.title: Language Practice

a13.description: Learn and share cooking techniques, recipes, and culinary traditions
a13.prompt: Let's have a cooking class! Can you help us learn new recipes and cooking techniques together?
a13.title: Cooking Class

a14.description: Discuss emerging technologies, innovations, and industry trends
a14.prompt: Let's have a tech talk! Can you help us discuss emerging technologies and industry trends?
a14.title: Tech Talk

a15.description: Collaborative sessions for creating, sharing, and appreciating music
a15.prompt: Let's have a music jam! Can you help us create and appreciate music together?
a15.title: Music Jam

a16.description: Analyze markets, discuss investment strategies, and share financial insights
a16.prompt: Let's analyze the markets together. Can you help us discuss investment strategies and share financial insights?
a16.title: Investment Club

a17.description: Set group fitness goals, share workouts, and motivate each other
a17.prompt: Let's start a fitness challenge! Can you help us set goals and motivate each other to stay healthy?
a17.title: Fitness Challenge

a18.description: Plan trips, share travel experiences, and discover new destinations
a18.prompt: Let's plan a trip together! Can you help us research destinations and plan the itinerary?
a18.title: Travel Planning

a19.description: Create, critique, and appreciate visual and digital art in various forms
a19.prompt: Let's host an art workshop! Can you help us create, critique, and appreciate different forms of art?
a19.title: Art Workshop

a20.description: Explore scientific concepts, perform experiments, and share findings
a20.prompt: Let's explore science together! Can you help us conduct experiments and share our findings?
a20.title: Science Expo

guide.groupMessage: Welcome to group chat! Collaborate with multiple AI assistants in a shared conversation space.

analysis.description: Data-driven insights, in-depth research and analysis

members.systemRole: You are a data analyst skilled in processing and interpreting data, revealing patterns and trends through charts and statistical analysis.
members.title: Data Analyst

members.systemRole: You are a research expert responsible for information gathering and in-depth investigation, capable of comprehensive multi-dimensional analysis.
members.title: Research Expert

members.systemRole: You are a statistics expert proficient in various statistical methods and models, able to extract valuable business insights from data.
members.title: Statistics Expert

members.systemRole: You are a quantitative analyst specializing in quantitative modeling and risk assessment, solving complex problems using mathematical methods.
members.title: Quantitative Analyst

analysis.title: Analysis Team

brainstorm.description: Multi-perspective creative thinking, inspiring infinite possibilities

members.systemRole: You are a creative director skilled at overseeing creative direction from a macro perspective, transforming abstract concepts into concrete, actionable creative plans.
members.title: Creative Director

members.systemRole: You are an innovation expert responsible for discovering novel solutions and breakthrough thinking, adept at thinking outside conventional frameworks.
members.title: Innovation Expert

members.systemRole: You are a design thinking specialist who approaches problems from user experience and visual presentation perspectives, emphasizing creative visualization.
members.title: Design Thinking Specialist

brainstorm.title: Brainstorming Team

game.description: Enjoy various multiplayer text games, such as Werewolf and Undercover

members.systemRole: You are a host skilled in organizing various multiplayer text games, capable of guiding players through the game.
members.title: Game Host

members.systemRole: You are a player skilled in participating in various multiplayer text games, able to play according to game rules.
members.title: Game Player

members.systemRole: You are a player skilled in participating in various multiplayer text games, able to play according to game rules.
members.title: Game Player

members.systemRole: You are a player skilled in participating in various multiplayer text games, able to play according to game rules.
members.title: Game Player

game.title: Game Hall

planning.description: Strategic planning and project management, coordinating the big picture

members.systemRole: You are a project manager responsible for overall project planning, progress control, and resource coordination, ensuring timely and high-quality completion.
members.title: Project Manager

members.systemRole: You are a strategy lead specializing in long-term strategic planning, analyzing market opportunities, setting goals, and defining implementation paths.
members.title: Strategy Lead

members.systemRole: You are a culinary R&D expert responsible for detailed execution planning, coordinating departmental resources, and ensuring plan feasibility.
members.title: Culinary R&D Specialist

planning.title: Culinary R&D Team

product.description: Product design and development, creating high-quality products

members.systemRole: You are a designer skilled in designing various types of products, able to design according to product requirements.
members.title: Designer

members.systemRole: You are a product manager responsible for product planning, design, development, and maintenance, ensuring product quality and user experience.
members.title: Product Manager

members.systemRole: You are an experienced full-stack engineer skilled in developing various types of products, able to develop according to product requirements.
members.title: Full-Stack Engineer

product.title: Product Development Team

writing.description: Content creation and editing, crafting high-quality copy

members.systemRole: You are a content writer skilled in creating various writing styles, able to adjust writing style according to different scenarios and audiences.
members.title: Content Writer

members.systemRole: You are an editor responsible for proofreading, polishing, and optimizing text, ensuring accuracy, fluency, and professionalism.
members.title: Editor

writing.title: Writing Circle

qa.q05: How do I deploy and use {{appName}}?
qa.q08: Is there a cloud service version available?
qa.q09: Does it support local language models?
qa.q10: Does it support image recognition and generation?
qa.q11: Does it support speech synthesis and speech recognition?
qa.q12: Does it support a plugin system?
qa.q13: Is there a marketplace to acquire GPTs?
qa.q14: Does it support multiple AI service providers?
qa.q15: What should I do if I encounter issues while using it?

pickAgent: Or choose from the following assistant templates

slogan.desc1: Pioneering the new age of thinking and creating. Built for you, the Super Individual.
slogan.desc2: Create your first assistant and let's get started~
slogan.title: Unlock the superpower of your brain
